content: "What?" Pharamp asked. "Nothing," Sysko lied, "we were talking about the effect of Confucianism on modern Chinese socialism."
translations: ita:Cosa﹖, chiese Pharamp. Niente, mentì Sysko, stavamo parlando dell'effetto del confucianesimo sul socialismo cinese moder
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by pandark (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
